name: A Nice Day For A Chicken
name_original: A Nice Day For A Chicken
description:
A Nice Day For A Chicken: Delicious Time Of A Berry

Hi! This is a silly little game I made when I found out about bitsy. If you don't know what that is, it's a cool little tool that lets you make simple little games like this.

This was originally going to be a weeklong project, but it ended up taking several months of off-and-on work to get into a place where I am happy with it. I hope you enjoy playing it!

Some control notes:

  • Use arrow keys to move around and interact
  • Just move into a thing or person to interact with them
  • Some items can be picked up and will be in your invisible inventory
  • If asked if you would like to do something, interact with the object again to do so.  Example: "Would you like to play this game?" Interact with the character who asked you to play once more to say yes.
  • Entering the Pie House is a 'no turning back' point. Collect anything you think you want to before entering. Leaving will start the game's ending sequence.
